title: Person: Red Hair
description:
A person with red hair. This emoji maintains red hair no matter which skin tone is chosen. This emoji may be used to talk about redheads in a gender-inclusive way.

apple_vendor_description: The person with red hair emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant and distinctive character, featuring a flowing mane of rich, fiery red hair with realistic highlights and subtle gradients. Apple's design language brings a soft, three-dimensional quality to the figure, with smooth rounded edges that give it a friendly and approachable feel. This emoji can represent individuals with red hair, add a touch of individuality and flair to a message, or symbolize passion, creativity, and boldness, all rendered with Apple's signature polished aesthetic.
